segments.text: As I stand here, I can’t help but feel a mix of emotions surging through me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are so bold, so daring, it’s both entertaining and alarming.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy swaying atop that stool makes my stomach churn.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see his grasp on the jar tighten, his little fingers trembling with excitement.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But then I’m startled by the sudden rush of water splashing onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think about how a simple cookie could lead to a disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There’s beauty in their innocent schemes, but the risks are so real.
segments.speaker: PAR
